verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>Command<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, My <S%H7133>offering,<s%> and my <S%H3899>bread<s%> for my sacrifices made by fire, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to me, shall you <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> to me in their due <S%H4150>season.<s%>

And you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H2088>This<s%> is the offering made by fire <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>spot<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day,<s%> for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

The <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> shall you <S%H6213>offer<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> shall you <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>even;<s%>

And a <S%H6224>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3795>beaten<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

It is a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, which was <S%H6213>ordained<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell,<s%> a sacrifice made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering thereof shall be the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb:<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place shall you cause the strong <S%H7941>wine<s%> to be <S%H5258>poured<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for a <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering.

And the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> shall you <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>even:<s%> as the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and as the <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering thereof, you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> it, a sacrifice made by fire, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>spot,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals of <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering thereof:
This is the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering of every <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and his <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering.

And in the <S%H7218>beginnings<s%> of your <S%H2320>months<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullocks,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>spot;<s%>

And <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals of <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bullock;<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals of <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram;<s%>

And a several <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deal of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb;<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell,<s%> a sacrifice made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And their <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings shall be <S%H2677>half<s%> an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> to a <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> to a <S%H352>ram,<s%> and a <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> to a <S%H3532>lamb:<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering of every <S%H2320>month<s%> throughout the <S%H2320>months<s%> of the <S%H8141>year.<s%>

And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H6213>offered,<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and his <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering.
And in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H6453>passover<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And in the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H2282>feast:<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> manner of <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein:

But you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a sacrifice made by fire for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullocks,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year:<s%> they shall be to you <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish:<s%>

And their meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil:<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals shall you <S%H6213>offer<s%> for a <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals for a <S%H352>ram;<s%>
A several <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deal shall you <S%H6213>offer<s%> for every <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> throughout the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs:<s%>
And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for you.

You shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

After <S%H428>this<s%> manner you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H3117>daily,<s%> throughout the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> the <S%H3899>meat<s%> of the sacrifice made by fire, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>offered<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and his <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering.

And <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

Also in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the first <S%H1061>fruits,<s%> when you <S%H7126>bring<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> after your <S%H7620>weeks<s%> be out, you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work:<s%>

But you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullocks,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year;<s%>

And their meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%>
A several <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deal to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> throughout the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs;<s%>
And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for you.

You shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> them <S%H905>beside<s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and his meat offering, (they shall be to you <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish)<s%> and their <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings.
